entry.title: 单词11月18日
entry.content:
synthetic

New synthetic foods will form a regular part of people’s diets.

constitute

China’s ethnic minorities constitute less than 7 percent of its total population.

Testing patients without their consent would constitute a professional and legal offence.

subsidise

Low rates subsidise borrowers at the expense of savers.

arbitrary

The choice of players for the team seemed completely arbitrary.

deter

Supporters of the death penalty argue that it would deter criminals from carrying guns.

designate

There are efforts under way to designate the bridge a historic landmark.

If you want to designate a period, you have to look at tangible things like pottery, particularly painted pottery, because it’s easier to categorize.

specify

The trick is not only to specify just one or even two dimensions of the objective, but also to understand how to help people better achieve the objective.

prop

I lie still for a minute until I can breathe normally, then stretch my arms out to prop myself up.

Peacock feathers should never be brought on stage, either as a costume element, prop or part of a set as chaos will ensue.

envisage

What level of profit do you envisage?

toll

The death toll continues to mount.

conceal

He didn’t attempt to dissimulate or conceal his true feelings.

entry.title: 单词11月17日
entry.content:
irritate

Still the news coverage is starting to irritate the Clinton team just a bit.

preside

They asked if I would preside at the committee meeting.

presume

We must presume innocence until we have proof of guilt.

crave

I must crave your pardon.

After all, what good are 100 HD channels if the ones you crave aren’t included?

futile

It would be futile to protest.

conceive

He apparently can’t conceive of a world that is both growing and getting better.

retaliate

If we do not retaliate for acts of aggression, we enter into a cycle of victimization.

whatsoever

They showed no consideration whatsoever for my feelings.

The Elder Brother is issuing this theory without any consideration, - obviously, whatsoever of earthly reality and we’re shocked by – I don’t know how else to put it.

relish

She savoured the moment with obvious relish.

staple

Fish is a staple in the diet of many Africans.

entry.title: 单词11月22日(完结)
entry.content:
shipment

He reduced his September quarter Mac shipment forecast to 4.4 million units from 4.9 million.

fling

“Fling the girl overboard,” cried Hook.

enforcement

The doctors want stricter enforcement of existing laws.

The city doubled the cordon zone in 2007 and reduced the enforcement period by one hour.

brace

If you can’t come up with the money in time, brace yourself for a financial nightmare.

Overhead, the lights showed the old timbers, used to brace the roof.

bolster

The country is free to adopt policies to bolster its economy.

impose

She didn’t want to impose her values on her family.

obsturct

They were accused of attempting to obstruct justice.

clog

Many diseases of the brain may be caused by clumps of proteins that clog its circuitry.

huddle

We lay there: a huddle of bodies, gasping for air.

pharmacy

If your pharmacy doesn’t stock the product you want, have them order it for you.

aversion

In many cases, they have a general aversion to the idea of elaborate theology.

toil

Button, in eight years of toil, never got into a car capable of winning races.

van

The driver got out of his van.

bluff

But, for the moment at any rate, it is his words that are bluff.

hygiene

She wasn’t very fastidious about personal hygiene.

gleam

There is no gleam of hope.

cram

The aim is to reduce the importance of costly tutors and cram schools, partly to help students enjoy a more normal high-school life.

undertake

University professors both teach and undertake research.

hamper

Avoid irritating scents like onion or ammonia, which can hamper smelling ability, he says.

ratify

Earlier,President Kaczynski had said he would ratify the Lisbon Treaty only if Ireland did.

consulate

He said that we have a consulate in Damascus and that Syria knows the U.S. position.

hectic

It was a hectic disorganized weekend.

commence

We commence building next week.

appropriate

We are available to sign an appropriate confidentiality agreement and commence due diligence immediately.

pretense

Sometimes she sent me over to check up on him under the pretense of bringing him medicine.

eligible

They are not eligible for sick pay.

foe

For development experts, such as Ehrhart, climate change is a formidable foe that must be tackled.

flank

They continued along the flank of the mountain.

scarce

Embryonic stem cell research has repeatedly raised ethical concerns and human eggs are a scarce resource.

hereby

As a first step, I hereby heartily endorse the framework laid out by the Bowles-Simpson Commission.

whereby

The two colleges have a reciprocal arrangement whereby students from one college can attend classes at the other.

namely

We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.

tame

These ideas may seem tame today, but they were inflammatory in his time.

zealous

To make up for the mediocrity, zealous parents send their kids to the expensive cram schools.

entry.title: 单词11月14日
entry.content:
peddle

These sites, which peddle links by the hundreds or the thousands, clearly violate Google’s guidelines.

oversee

Simon Hart, a former director of social services in north-east England, is to overseeimprovements.

fortify

We therefore need to fortify our national resolve for more losses before the situation improves.

amass

Government debt is, more or less, the aggregate of all of the deficits that we amass.

deplete

Patients with mixed cellularity or lymphocyte deplete subtypes of HL often have HL involving the liver.

formulate

The author is right, mind keeps on spinning ideas whereby the same can formulate into realities!

disclose

The trouble for investors: Companies disclose very little if any information about their exposure to water-related risks.

overtake

It’s dangerous to overtake on a bend.

rectify

Johnson will certainly rectify this omission in the book’s next edition, one of many to come.

endow

One way the alliance can send signals is to endow the secretary-general, however fictitiously, with enormous powers.

waive

He resolved to waive rank and make friends with the calf.

inaugurate

Over two weekends later this month it will inaugurate its own program, Open Streets!

propagate

The name draws on old ideas about a supposedly ubiquitous, invisible medium that helped light propagate.

elicit

Getting it all right would still elicit snickers if he called the outfit a uniform.

dismantle

It’s one thing cutting the jigsaw but it’s totally another thing for it to dismantle itself.

denote

Books that benefited from bulk sales are supposed to have a dagger icon next to them to denote that fact.

avert

Those hoping that the report would outline steps to avert a similar crash were disappointed.

endorse

The other critical policy that needs to be in place is one the UK has refused to endorse.

entry.title: 单词11月13日
entry.content:
monopolise

Microsoft should not have been found liable for attempting to monopolize the browser market, the court said.

beset

Beset by mischance, confounded by disorder, they had mostly done what they were asked to do.

steer

But the purpose is to steer banks towards supporting businesses and jobs at home, not abroad.

You row and I’ll steer.

indict

The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspect.

stump

If you have a tree stump, check it for fungus.

entry.title: 单词11月12日
entry.content:
appal

To survive, the currency may come to acquire a level of fiscal-policy co-ordination that will appal the British.

culminate

The next great set-top standby debate is brewing and will culminate in February 2009.

standby

Five ambulances are on standby at the port.

slump

The toy industry is in a slump.

assembly

May’s election saw Plaid slump to 11 seats - its worst tally since the assembly was established.

converge

Gaming and Hollywood continues to converge and these creatives are forging ahead with new cross-platform experiences.

segregate

A large detachment of police was used to segregate the two rival camps of protesters.

dignify

I’m not going to dignify his comments by reacting to them.

rattle

She slams the kitchen door so hard I hear dishes rattle.

There was a rattle of rifle fire.

inflate

You can begin to implement soft polices that are subtle,where you can slowly inflate.

evaporate

Once that develops into an oversupply profits evaporate and the investment spigot is turned off.

interrogate

The lawyer took two hours to interrogate the witness.

petition

She was reduced to having to petiton the court for the money to get her lawn mowed.

constrain

The heavier debt-servicing costs will contrain consumer budgets over the next year or so.

deplore

We deplore the shift to blogs, snippets,andtweets.

disrupt

It could disrupt the food chain there.

entry.title: 视奸11月11日
entry.content:
双十一了，但是基本没买什么。

所以今天实践qln了。

entry.title: 单词11月10日
entry.content:
dampen

Nothing seems to dampen his perpetual enthusiasm.

patronise

I’ll never patronize that store again.

prolong

It seems commonly believed that companies are not motivated to prolong their products’ lifespan.

amend

To forestall is better than to amend.

scrutinise

My YouTube likes are now automatically posted to my tumblr page for my followers to scrutinise.

martyr

She’s a martyr, suffering the trials and tribulations of being married to a filmmaker!

assimilate

Of all these places, she considers America to be the easiest place to assimilate.

We hear a lot about how globalisation exerts negative pressures on small cultures to assimilate.

overhear

Are ears perking up as others overhear your cell phone conversation in a crowded restaurant or airport lounge?

entrust

If they manage the money we entrust them with poorly, we simply find new managers.

enclose

Farmers may want to put up electric fences to enclose grazing areas, called paddocks.

solidify

The mixture will solidify into toffee.

confide

And those who use instant messaging report having more people they can confide in.

evade

He managed to evade capture.

curtail

It is this environment, if sustained that will help curtail drug smuggling into the United States.

wield

America would have by far the most influence, if it chose to wield it.

reconcile

It can be very busy and hectic, and it is difficult to reconcile conflicting demands.

entail

The extent of the Israeli concessions it will entail has become clear in recent days.

What kind of responsibilities does that job entail?

defer

Customers often defer payment for as long as possible.

entry.content:
synthetic

New synthetic foods will form a regular part of people’s diets.

constitute

China’s ethnic minorities constitute less than 7 percent of its total population.

Testing patients without their consent would constitute a professional and legal offence.

subsidise

Low rates subsidise borrowers at the expense of savers.

arbitrary

The choice of players for the team seemed completely arbitrary.

deter

Supporters of the death penalty argue that it would deter criminals from carrying guns.

designate

There are efforts under way to designate the bridge a historic landmark.

If you want to designate a period, you have to look at tangible things like pottery, particularly painted pottery, because it’s easier to categorize.

specify

The trick is not only to specify just one or even two dimensions of the objective, but also to understand how to help people better achieve the objective.

prop

I lie still for a minute until I can breathe normally, then stretch my arms out to prop myself up.

Peacock feathers should never be brought on stage, either as a costume element, prop or part of a set as chaos will ensue.

envisage

What level of profit do you envisage?

toll

The death toll continues to mount.

He didn’t attempt to dissimulate or conceal his true feelings.

entry.title: 要好好学习了
entry.content:
49也想学习11.7

为了让每天多干点正经事，以后会记录每天学了啥以及对某些要干的事情的计划。

三个项目

Godot游戏开发

算是准备开始做第二个游戏了

大概是starrealm的一个游戏

也是用godot制作的第一个游戏

今天新建了文件夹

哈哈

期末：坦克大战项目

这次有了上次的经验

首先要干的事情是把基本的引擎组件搓出来

毕竟用java swing实现游戏的话还是太自己造轮子了

想到啥实现啥会导致项目特别乱

个人工具网站开发

初步规划是做个美化的个人简介界面

然后挂上我的博客和图床

八个科目

可以说是这学期压力的主要来源，每一个都是重量级。

  • 概率论
  • 线性代数
  • 算法
  • 操作系统
  • 计算机网络
  • 计算机组成原理
  • 英语
  • 日语

两个锻炼

希望这学期3km能跑到稳5分配以内

希望这学期唱歌可以把B4以下打磨

entry.title: 死亡十一月
entry.content:
马上要进入死亡十一月和死亡十二月了

不知道这个月能不能合理的完成任务

心累啊…

破事一堆

entry.title: 假期的前夕
entry.content:
今天是周四
明天就要放假了捏
今天把一些莫名其妙的东西解决了
比如之前的飞行棋游戏
总算收尾了

感觉11月和12月会很忙
不过马上放假了
放假结束再考虑这些吧

entry.title: 一言难尽的周三
entry.content:
今天给博客上了个域名

www.49bit.cc

我还是很满意这个域名的

但是部署阶段感觉出了亿点点问题，给我现成的框架我都不会调

平时不好好学前端的有难了

不过感觉听web课也没啥用

还是多从小项目出发吧

entry.title: 熟悉markdown操作
entry.content:
你好，这是我的第一篇博客，试试markdown语法吧。

这是一个标题

我只是在测试markdown的功能而已。

一级标题

这是一级标题

二级标题

这是二级标题

三级标题

这是三级标题

四级标题

这是四级标题

我来试试引用功能

再来试一试列表:

  1. 这还得英文引号才行啊
  2. 那好吧

无序列表呢:

  • 那看起来还行
  • 再试试

再来试试:

  • 测试
  • 测试
  • 测试

再来试试代码块

然后出现一个有点复杂的东西 表格诶

测试这是表格

如果我想要加粗的话

假如我想要斜体的话

然后是脚注功能^脚注

然后我想插入一条横线

那假如我想插入一个超链接 百度

用html里的也可以诶这是一段下划线

:smile:

哇 html真好用
